abstract: McCormick & Company, a leading seasonings retailer, has agreed to sell Season-All line as part of a deal to gain antitrust approval for its $605 million deal to buy Lawry’s Seasoned Salt from Unilever.
lead_paragraph: McCormick & Company, a leading seasonings retailer, has agreed to sell Season-All line as part of a deal to gain antitrust approval for its $605 million deal to buy Lawry’s Seasoned Salt from Unilever.

headline.main: McCormick Sells Unit to Win Deal Approval
